resources.string:
This is phonebill mobile application and it contains below functionality.

  1. You can add calls and customer name by clicking on button add calls. Below is input field constraints.
    • Customer Name - Should not be empty
    • Caller - It should be 10 character only
    • Callee - It should be 10 character only
    • start date time - It should be in MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm am/pm
    • end date time - It should be in MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm am/pm

  2. Search call button contains below functionality.
    • Input field Cust Name - Should not be empty
    • Input field Caller - It should be 10 character only(Optional field)
    • Input field Callee - It should be 10 character only(Optional field)
    • By clicking on pretty print button you can get calls in pretty format.
    • By clicking on search calls button you can get calls in raw format.
    • By providing only customer name you can get all calls of specific customer.
    • By providing caller and callee you can get all calls of specific customet from given caller to callee.
    • By providing only customer name and caller phone number you can get all calls of given customer.
    • By providing only customer name and callee you can get all calls of given customer.
